HeroSection.welcome: Welcome to Caffe Bar Kobra — view the price list below

legal.vat: VAT is not included in the price (Article 90 of the VAT Act).
legal.complaintsBook: The complaints book is available at the bar or by visiting
legal.noAlcoholUnder18: Serving alcoholic drinks to persons under 18 is prohibited.

s1.title: 1. General information
s1.p1: This website is an informational digital price list for the hospitality venue {brand}, available at {domain}.
s1.p2: By using this website, you confirm that you have read and accept these Terms of Use in full.

s2.title: 2. Purpose of the website
s2.p1: The content on this website is provided for informational purposes only and is intended to present the drink offer and prices at {brand}.
s2.p2: Displayed prices apply to in-venue service and are valid on the publication date, and may change without prior notice.

s3.title: 3. Accuracy and availability of information
s3.p1: The venue owner aims to keep all information accurate and up to date, but does not accept liability for unintentional errors in prices, descriptions, or product availability.
s3.p2: In case of any discrepancy between the digital price list and the price list displayed inside the venue, the in-venue price list shall prevail.

s4.title: 4. Alcohol service
s4.p1: In accordance with Croatian regulations, the sale and serving of alcoholic beverages to persons under 18 years of age is prohibited.
s4.p2: Venue staff may request an ID document to verify a guest’s age.

s5.title: 5. Complaints
s5.p1: Guests have the right to submit a written complaint in accordance with the Croatian Consumer Protection Act.
s5.p2: A complaints book is available at the venue, and complaints may also be submitted via the email address listed on the Complaint page.
s5.p3: Written complaints will be answered within the legally prescribed timeframe.

s6.title: 6. Copyright
s6.p1: All content published on this website, including text, visual elements and design, is protected by copyright and must not be used, reproduced, or distributed without prior consent of the owner.

s7.title: 7. Changes to these terms
s7.p1: The owner reserves the right to amend these Terms of Use at any time, without prior notice.

s8.title: 8. Applicable law
s8.p1: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the Republic of Croatia.

Complaint.title: Complaint
Complaint.intro: If you have a complaint regarding our service, you can contact us via email.
Complaint.emailText: Please send your complaint to the following email address:

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: For any information, you can contact us by email or visit us at our location.
Contact.emailHint: Tapping the email opens your mail app.
